creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: crooked, moss-covered tree with sprawling branches spotted with pink and red plum blossoms on low green hill at R; tips of blossoming branches at bottom L
medium: Ink and color on gilded paper
signed: LRC: (Painted by the Recluse from the capital Kyoto Shisui Shinsei at age 81)
title: Plum Trees
